creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: silk wrap skirt with wide cotton band at top and two ties; two partial lined panels of blue/green damask silk; large floral and bird patterns on lower half in shades of beige, rose, magenta, gold, green and blue; vertical embroidery on seams and edges; two parts of panels have finely tucked handstitched pleats the length of skirt
dimension:
35 3/8 x 41 in. (89.85 x 104.14 cm) (at waistband)
29 in. (73.66 cm) (object part, ties)
title: Streamer Skirt
